title: Quick service restaurants, cafe chains see slower growth
description: Major quick service restaurant chains including McDonald's, KFC, Pizza Hut, and Starbucks experienced a sharp decline in sales and revenue growth in the April-June quarter. This downturn was driven by inflation, increased competition, and an intense heatwave. Notably, McDonald's operator, Westlife Foodworld, and Tata-operated Starbucks reported significant downturns.
